drug.name: Secretin porcine
drug.description: Secretin porcine stimulates pancreatic and gastric secretions to aid in the diagnosis of pancreatic exocrine dysfunction and the diagnosis of gastrinoma.

category.category: Hormones, Hormone Substitutes, and Hormone Antagonists

drug-interaction.name: Tramadol
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Secretin porcine can be decreased when used in combination with Tramadol.
